summary.para: The NET_IF_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE enumeration type specifies the NDIS network interface duplex state.

remarks.para: The NDIS_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE, enumeration type, used to describe NDIS interface providers in the OID_GEN_MEDIA_DUPLEX_STATE, OID, is equivalent to this enumeration.

summary.para: The duplex state of the miniport adapter is unknown.
The miniport adapter can transmit or receive but not both simultaneously.
The miniport adapter can transmit and receive simultaneously.
